questions: - How can I install Elasticsearch as a Docker container on Ubuntu?
- How to install Elasticsearch on Ubuntu?
- What is the command to run Elasticsearch as a Docker container on Ubuntu?
- What is the version of Elasticsearch used in the command?
answer:
# How can I install Elasticsearch as a Docker container on Ubuntu?
To install Elasticsearch as a Docker container on Ubuntu, use the following command:

```
docker run -p 9200:9200 -p 9300:9300 -e "discovery.type=single-node" docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.13.2
```
